84af2c8f-4fba-4242-ae44-d5eba1a5e957.title: Sprint 1 Kickoff Meeting
84af2c8f-4fba-4242-ae44-d5eba1a5e957.description: Facilitate comprehensive Sprint 1 kickoff meeting covering sprint goal, backlog commitment, development workflow setup, and team coordination. Follow the detailed agenda in the Sprint 1 Kickoff Plan document. Duration: 4 hours.

e1772b50-cc68-4341-942f-31bf34935d6d.title: Next.js Project Setup & Technical Foundation
e1772b50-cc68-4341-942f-31bf34935d6d.description: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript, configure development environment, set up state management (Zustand), styling (Tailwind CSS), testing framework (Jest + RTL), and establish basic project structure. Includes tasks T-001 through T-015 from Sprint 1 plan.

1cfb7536-fb76-4514-b20e-9d87c9bb3048.title: PBI-001: Create Todo List Feature
1cfb7536-fb76-4514-b20e-9d87c9bb3048.description: Implement user ability to create new todo lists with form validation, success feedback, and immediate display on dashboard. Includes form component, validation logic, state management integration, and responsive design. Story Points: 5

75417c8d-a0db-4c46-bcfa-b2c958ec2db7.title: PBI-002: View Todo Lists Dashboard
75417c8d-a0db-4c46-bcfa-b2c958ec2db7.description: Implement dashboard displaying all todo lists with responsive design, empty states, alphabetical sorting, and click navigation. Includes list display components, responsive layout, and performance optimization for 50+ lists. Story Points: 3

9714f3bc-bd8d-443d-a2df-7c493bddfc4b.title: PBI-003: Edit Todo List Name
9714f3bc-bd8d-443d-a2df-7c493bddfc4b.description: Implement inline editing functionality for todo list names with keyboard shortcuts (Enter to save, Escape to cancel), validation to prevent empty names, and immediate visual feedback. Story Points: 3

3c2ab0f8-0923-45ab-a6cd-8728958ec25f.title: PBI-004: Delete Todo List
3c2ab0f8-0923-45ab-a6cd-8728958ec25f.description: Implement delete functionality with confirmation modal showing number of todos to be deleted, cascade deletion of all todos, success notification, and proper error handling. Story Points: 5

0c5a0c0e-f017-4050-9f45-639fd4cd9c16.title: Sprint 1 Daily Standups & Team Coordination
0c5a0c0e-f017-4050-9f45-639fd4cd9c16.description: Facilitate daily 15-minute standups at 9:00 AM for 10 working days, track sprint progress, identify and resolve blockers, monitor team velocity and sprint burndown, and maintain team coordination and communication.

3c88d64a-70b1-4f25-8b82-07d1d1552ac7.title: Sprint 1 Review & Retrospective
3c88d64a-70b1-4f25-8b82-07d1d1552ac7.description: Facilitate Sprint 1 review demo (2 hours) showing completed features to stakeholders, conduct sprint retrospective (1 hour) with team to identify improvements, document lessons learned, and prepare Sprint 2 planning inputs.

46649d31-fac9-4593-bce5-4b8d3ba557d1.title: Next.js Project Setup and Foundation
46649d31-fac9-4593-bce5-4b8d3ba557d1.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and complete development environment setup according to system architecture specifications. Create folder structure, configure development tools, and establish project foundation for Sprint 1 development.

context.handoff_reason: Project setup requires technical leadership and coordination
context.expectations: Set up complete Next.js foundation according to architecture specs
context.support_available: System architect documentation and scrum master coordination

b564ef61-e91e-40a1-8382-e1c3df547d70.title: PBI-001: Create Todo Lists
b564ef61-e91e-40a1-8382-e1c3df547d70.description: Implement the ability to create new todo lists with names. User should be able to add multiple lists and see them displayed in the dashboard. Includes form validation, UI components, and local storage persistence.

context.user_story: As a user, I can create new todo lists so that I can organize my tasks into different categories
acceptance_criteria: User can enter list name in form
context.handoff_reason: Frontend UI development for todo list creation
context.expectations: Implement user-friendly list creation with validation and persistence

451f943d-38b9-495a-b9e9-eb5821f18e2d.title: PBI-002: View Todo Lists Dashboard
451f943d-38b9-495a-b9e9-eb5821f18e2d.description: Create the main dashboard where users can view all their todo lists. Implement responsive design, list cards with basic information, and navigation to individual lists.

context.user_story: As a user, I can view all my todo lists in a dashboard so that I can see what lists I have and access them easily
acceptance_criteria: Empty state when no lists exist
context.handoff_reason: Frontend dashboard development with responsive design
context.expectations: Create intuitive dashboard showing all todo lists with mobile support

48a9400d-d74c-4563-bfe6-e5ee34c496ce.title: PBI-003: Edit Todo List Names
48a9400d-d74c-4563-bfe6-e5ee34c496ce.description: Allow users to edit the names of existing todo lists. Implement inline editing with validation and persistence to local storage.

context.user_story: As a user, I can edit todo list names so that I can update them as my needs change
acceptance_criteria: Click to edit list name inline
context.expectations: Implement inline editing with validation for todo list names

d7d5a865-261f-47e2-a381-18f3b00bf222.title: PBI-004: Delete Todo Lists
d7d5a865-261f-47e2-a381-18f3b00bf222.description: Implement the ability to delete todo lists with confirmation dialog. Remove from local storage and update the dashboard view.

context.user_story: As a user, I can delete todo lists so that I can remove lists I no longer need
acceptance_criteria: Delete button available on each list
context.expectations: Implement safe deletion with confirmation dialog and immediate UI updates
